Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService")
SealModel = InsertService:LoadAsset(155681109) SealAI = SealModel:GetChildren()[1]:Clone() SealModel:Destroy()
SealSpawnRadius = 10
Seals = {} Debounce = false
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function DisableTool() Tool.Enabled = false wait(20) Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function Activated(Mouse) if #Seals == 0 then Debounce = true Handle.Transparency = 1 local SealAIClone = SealAI:Clone() SealAIClone:FindFirstChild("Creator").Value = Player local SealTorso = SealAIClone:FindFirstChild("Torso") table.insert(Seals, SealAIClone) Debris:AddItem(SealAIClone, (60 * 2)) SealAIClone.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") SealTorso.CFrame = Torso.CFrame + Torso.CFrame.lookVector * (((Torso.Size.Z / 2) + (SealAIClone:GetModelSize().Z / 2)) * 1.25) for i, v in pairs(Seals) do local SealTorso = v:FindFirstChild("Torso") local SealHumanoid = v:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if SealHumanoid then v.Changed:connect(function() if not v.Parent then for ii, vv in pairs(Seals) do if v == vv then table.remove(Seals, ii) if #Seals == 0 then DisableTool() end end end end end) SealHumanoid.Died:connect(function() for ii, vv in pairs(Seals) do if v == vv then table.remove(Seals, ii) if #Seals == 0 then DisableTool() end end v:Destroy() end end) end end Debounce = false else for i, v in pairs(Seals) do if Mouse.Target then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Mouse.Target) if character and humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then v.Target.Value = character v.Mode.Value = "Attack" else v.Target.Value = nil v.WalkToPoint.Value = Mouse.Hit.p v.Mode.Value = "Wander" end else v.Target.Value = nil if v.Mode.Value == "Pause" then v.Mode.Value = "Follow" else v.Mode.Value = "Pause" end end end end end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Character or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if Tool.Enabled and not Debounce then Activated(Mouse) end end) end
function Unequipped()
end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
